AI Description: Guile is an implementation of the Scheme programming language, providing a flexible and embeddable scripting environment for applications. It aims to be a platform for creating applications and libraries that require customizations and extensibility.
Core Features: Guile offers a powerful Scheme interpreter, a reliable extension language for C and C++ programs, an interactive environment for Scheme development, a large standard library, and a module system that supports extension scripts and plugins.
General Tags: Programming Language, Scripting Language, Embeddable, Customizable
